attributes.action: Make Carlos Tevez an honourary Citizen for his services to decent football.and ban Dave whelan from sports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carlos Tevez has taken English football to new heights of professionalism and skill. He has saved a glorious club from the indignity of coca cola league football while At the same time relegating a clogging team to where they belong. The affair has also highlighted the dodgy dealings of other club chairman. Help Tevez stay at west ham and at the same time change the laws of the country to stop chairman who use slave labour, fix prices and destroy local rugby clubs in competition to them , from holding directorships of sporting clubs and chainstores.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
